DOC.brief_summary: A multisite trial test different dosage level systematic form Pediatric Constraint-Induced ( CI ) Therapy call ACQUIREc Therapy . The high dosage treatment involve 6 hour daily therapy service 21 day . This compare moderate dosage level 3 hour daily therapy service 21 day . It hypothesize child receive high therapy dosage would great clinically significant benefit ACQUIREc Therapy group child would benefit therapy service .
DOC.criteria: Children 36 year age Hemiparetic CP No prior CI therapy treatments No Botox 6months
